plot: Betty follows some strong leads; Veronica uncovers a crucial piece of evidence; Archie struggles with a devastating decision.

After confronting the parents, who were part of "The Midnight Club" twenty-five years ago, Betty follows some strong leads in hopes of finding out who the true Gargoyle King is. Meanwhile, Veronica's attempt to prove Archie's innocence lands her in hot water. Finally, Archie turns to Kevin for help making things right.—sarah_l91

Betty sends invitations as the "Gargoyle King" to get all of the parents to one place and force their secrets out into the open. All of the parents prove to be viable suspects for the murder of Featherhead and the present-day game. Joaquin returns and reveals answers about the warden. The warden's death reveals Hiram's ties to the game. Veronica discovers a crucial piece of evidence for exonerating Archie. Archie and Kevin head up to the Shadow Mines, followed closely by Fred and Tom. Archie struggles with a devastating decision. Alice makes a sacrifice when she and Betty are endangered.—snowflakeaudrey
